data.subTitle: Aspiring MERN stack developer with practical experience in building full-stack applications.
aboutDescription: Hello! I'm Janani Priya, a passionate full-stack web developer based in Coimbatore, India.
With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and the MERN stack, I've crafted dynamic and responsive web applications.
I've gained hands-on experience through internships and projects, working with frameworks like React.js, Next.js, and integrating REST APIs.
Currently pursuing my Master of Computer Applications at Bharathiar University, I'm expanding my expertise in advanced web technologies.
Beyond coding, I enjoy combining design and development to create user-friendly digital experiences.
I've contributed to projects like HR management systems, college event platforms, and academy websites, all focused on real-world problem-solving.
If you're interested in collaborating or exploring my work, check out my portfolio below. Let's connect!

projects.description: Blackstone Infomatics, based in Coimbatore, India, specializes in web design and development, digital marketing, graphic design, UI/UX design, and app development, aiming to elevate your brand's online success.  Established in 2019, their team offers tailored solutions to enhance your digital presence.
Al-Furqan's website offers online Quran and Arabic learning with structured courses and interactive lessons. It provides a user-friendly platform for students to enhance their Islamic knowledge.

Al-Furqan Academy's academic platform connects teachers, students, admins, and supervisors for seamless online Quran and Arabic learning. It offers structured courses, progress tracking, and efficient management tools.
